about_the_game:
After being thrown away by his owner, Chester has to face the the world alone. The player will have to overcome various obstacles, enemies, and puzzles along the way, while exploring 5 unique locations.




There's a lot of new things to see and use. Find special items and tools to forge pathways through the unknown. Getting home is going to take some creativity, so keep an eye out for anything useful.





Ever since Chester found himself discarded among the trash, a darkness has been lurking inside of him... and growing. Through the anger, loneliness, and grief, you'll have to learn to face it, and keep it from consuming you.

Gameplay Info:

Chester: Into The Darkness is a full length story driven horror game about anger, and learning to forgive. Step into Chester's shoes and find your way back home after being thrown away. Anger, loneliness, and grief are growing and festering within, pushing Chester to darker and darker places. You'll have to learn to overcome this hardship, or watch it destroy you. Progress through 5 unique locations, while learning to face the darkness within.

EPILEPSY WARNING: Chester: Into The Darkness features flashing screens, bright lights, and disorienting visual effects. Please consult your doctor before playing if you have a history of epilepsy.
COLOR BLINDNESS WARNING: Some areas of the game require the player to differentiate between colors to proceed.

short_description: After being thrown into the trash, Chester has to fight his way back home while learning to face the darker side of himself.
